New Records: The Cleveland Guardians achieved their largest shutout victory margin in postseason history
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer on his first postseason swing
Cleveland's bullpen combined for 4 1/3 hitless innings
The Tigers were shut out in the final four innings
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch acknowledged the strength of Cleveland's bullpen
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the 2,327th meeting between the two teams
